description:
The "Aery Early Birds Bundle" features the first 3 titles of the Aery Series. Experience the original roots of the Aery Seires, lean back and enjoy the feeling of flying. 

All 3 games are story-driven non-violent exploration games where a little bird has to collect shards of its memory in order to discover new worlds and continue with the storyline.

The games included are: 
-	Aery – Little Bird Adventure
-	Aery – Sky Castle
-	Aery – Broken Memories
name: Aery Early Birds Bundle
